original_title: Horas Amang: Tiga Bulan untuk Selamanya
overview: The story of a family that is not harmonious: Amang or father (Cok Simbara) and his three unfilial children. Out of love for her children, Amang uses an unusual way to change their lives forever.
title: Horas Amang: Tiga Bulan untuk Selamanya
